title: Russians Against Invasion
sub_head: Protesters condemn Putin’s war, and so do investors.
body:
At great personal risk, brave people across Russia are voicing their opposition to Vladimir Putin’s invasion of Ukraine. James Beardsworth reports for the Moscow Times:
In the U.S., it’s easy to become cynical observing Hollywood celebrities pretending to be brave as they mouth politically correct talking points and broadcast cost-free virtue signals. But in Russia criticizing Putin’s depredations can cost everything. Fortune’s Tristan Bove has more on the dissidents:
